version_name: 5.3.1: + Love logging in with Facebook? Good news: now it works extra nicely. + When there’s something strange in your interface
5.3.1: + Love logging in with Facebook? Good news: now it works extra nicely. + When there’s something strange in your interface
5.4.1: + Go from uploading to watching in a split sec. Video conversion just got even quicker. Again.+ No need for citronella candles — we've already eliminated those pesky bugs.
5.4.1: + Go from uploading to watching in a split sec. Video conversion just got even quicker. Again.+ No need for citronella candles — we've already eliminated those pesky bugs.

5.4.2: + Go from uploading to watching in a split sec. Video conversion just got even quicker. Again. + Were ghosts mysteriously logging you out of the app? Not anymore. Bug = fixed. + Stability above all — we made sharing via the iOS extension more relia

5.4.2: + Go from uploading to watching in a split sec. Video conversion just got even quicker. Again. + Were ghosts mysteriously logging you out of the app? Not anymore. Bug = fixed. + Stability above all — we made sharing via the iOS extension more relia

version_description: We’ve emerged from our winter video cocoons to bring you something big: 360 video, now on Vimeo. Watch cinematic 360 video on your phone, or sync up with your favorite headset and enjoy a wondrously immersive experience. Download Ultra HD 360 video to pla

We’ve emerged from our winter video cocoons to bring you something big: 360 video, now on Vimeo. Watch cinematic 360 video on your phone, or sync up with your favorite headset and enjoy a wondrously immersive experience. Download Ultra HD 360 video to pla

Fresh from April showers, we’re coming in hot with brand new notifications. Now you get instant updates for activity on your Vimeo account: new likes (nice), new followers (friends!), and new comments on your videos (nice friends!). See these inside the a

We’re taking care of our bones! We finished some infrastructure updates, so your favorite videos run smoother than ever. Go take ‘em on a run around the block.

Let us know what you think (and don’t forget to stretch).

We’re taking care of our bones! We finished some infrastructure updates, so your favorite videos run smoother than ever. Go take ‘em on a run around the block.

Let us know what you think (and don’t forget to stretch).

Back, ye foul beasts! We’re introducing mature content filters to help you avoid any videos that you might find inappropriate. On top of that, this update includes blocking and reporting options to keep sketchy profiles and videos away from your eyeballs

Back, ye foul beasts! We’re introducing mature content filters to help you avoid any videos that you might find inappropriate. On top of that, this update includes blocking and reporting options to keep sketchy profiles and videos away from your eyeballs
Must. Keep. Watching. This update introduces continuous playback. As soon as you finish a video, the next one will automatically start playing — without so much as tapping a button.
Must. Keep. Watching. This update introduces continuous playback. As soon as you finish a video, the next one will automatically start playing — without so much as tapping a button.

Now it’s way easier to find your stuff. When you search, your own videos will appear in a separate tab called, easily enough, “My videos.”

In other news, we’ve added functionality to block spammy links, and fixed a notification bug. Happy screen-ta

Now it’s way easier to find your stuff. When you search, your own videos will appear in a separate tab called, easily enough, “My videos.”

In other news, we’ve added functionality to block spammy links, and fixed a notification bug. Happy screen-ta

Nice! Now you can watch live events right from the comfort of the Vimeo app, and see a little piece of everything that’s happening in the world. (If you want to create your own event, head to your computer to get started.)

Nice! Now you can watch live events right from the comfort of the Vimeo app, and see a little piece of everything that’s happening in the world. (If you want to create your own event, head to your computer to get started.)

Behold! Your videos spread from edge to shining edge of the new iPhone X. Aside from supporting the latest devices, this version includes some tweaks to the list that shows which videos are coming up next, a quick fix for continuous playback, and a couple

Behold! Your videos spread from edge to shining edge of the new iPhone X. Aside from supporting the latest devices, this version includes some tweaks to the list that shows which videos are coming up next, a quick fix for continuous playback, and a couple

Aside from an updated design for the tall new iPhone X, this version includes some tweaks to the list that shows which videos are coming up next, a quick fix for continuous playback, and a couple repairs to our infrastructure.

Aside from an updated design for the tall new iPhone X, this version includes some tweaks to the list that shows which videos are coming up next, a quick fix for continuous playback, and a couple repairs to our infrastructure.
This version comes with a viewer count for live events, so you can keep track of how many people are watching the live stream. And if you like bugs, bad news: we squashed some.
This version comes with a viewer count for live events, so you can keep track of how many people are watching the live stream. And if you like bugs, bad news: we squashed some.

You might need a microscope to see this lil’ update: we made a few technical improvements to how our system checks on upload quotas. Other than that, it’s the same great Vimeo with an ever-rising sea of incredible videos and time-saving tools for uploadin

You might need a microscope to see this lil’ update: we made a few technical improvements to how our system checks on upload quotas. Other than that, it’s the same great Vimeo with an ever-rising sea of incredible videos and time-saving tools for uploadin

Happy holidays! We wrapped up this magical year of new features with a big batch of little bug fixes. Take a tour of our best updates on the app and the site, like HDR and 360 support, Vimeo Live, and a whole lot of video management tools. Maybe you’ll he

New year, new bug-free us. This is the first update of 2018, so let’s all give a hip hip hooray to another year of amazing videos. (You don’t have to yell “hooray,” you can just whisper it if you want.) Have fun, and let us know what you think!

To all those who want more tools and more storage (like, a lot more storage) right from your phone: rejoice. Now you can upgrade to a Plus membership from the app, making it that much easier to add the videos you want and adjust settings without having to

To all those who want more tools and more storage (like, a lot more storage) right from your phone: rejoice. Now you can upgrade to a Plus membership from the app, making it that much easier to add the videos you want and adjust settings without having to

Now you can save your own video files in 4K, 1080p, 720p, or even lil 540p, right to your Camera Roll.

“Hey, Siri, upload a video to Vimeo.” That’s a completely normal thing you can say out loud, only now, something will actually happen. These release lets you use a Siri shortcut to upload a video just by talking! Pop into your Siri settings and add your o

In this update, we optimized some stuff under the hood that you won’t really notice. In case you missed the big stuff, we made it easier to send video files, no matter the size. From your video: tap Share, then Share video file, and send the link to whoev

This update introduces individual video stats, including impressions, plays, play rate, and play source URLs! So, next time you’re at a party, and some inconsiderate guest brings up the unspeakable horror that is the new Black Hole pic, you can mitigate t

We added individual video stats, including impressions, plays, play rate, and play source URLs! Next time you’re on the go and dying to track your video’s performance, just pop into the app for a comprehensive breakdown of the essential stats and analytic

We improved video settings to make it easier than ever to send your files. From your video: tap Share, then Send video file, and send the link to whoever you want. If you don’t have the right setting turned on, you can do fix right from the sharing menu.
